subject: [Radiance-general] clouds textures
body:
Message-ID: <C0054483.144D%giulio.antonutto@exchange.arup.com>

This is a quick way:

void colorpict dist
echo 11 noop noop noop image.pic fisheye.cal fish_u fish_v -rx 90 -rz 90
0
0

dist glow skyglow
0
0
4 1 1 1 0

skyglow source sky
0
0
4 0 0 1 180


Hope it works/helps :-)
Ciao
G.


SP you need a -vth image...
